questions: What are the start and end points for the McCarran Airport Connector?

table: Hidden Well Road, Gilespie Street – Rental Car Return

At-grade intersection; northern terminus of MAC; NB lanes continue as Swenson Street; Paradise Road feeds into SB lanes
